title: Experience the future — where intelligence meets intuition.
description: A sleek AI landing page that highlights why choose AI and how it works with smooth animations and minimal UI.

title: Where taste meets theater.
description: An immersive hero with GSAP-driven entrance and scrubbed video playback that feels like a mini product film.

title: Your Car, Our Priority.
description: A sleek and responsive landing page for a premium car service center, built to showcase offerings, customer trust, and easy booking options.

title: Smart campaigns. Real results.
description: Elegant landing experience combining strategic messaging and visual storytelling to boost campaign ROIs.

title: Sip. Scroll. Smile.
description: Interactive landing page showcasing a beverage bottle with smooth GSAP scroll animations and micro-interactions

title: Dress your mood.
description: A playful, image-forward landing experience that helps customers discover outfits by vibe and occasion.

title: Transform your energy. Transform your life.
description: A modern fitness landing page built to motivate users toward a healthier lifestyle, featuring smooth sections, call-to-action elements, and engaging visuals.

title: Styled for living, designed for you.
description: Minimal layout focused on lifestyle photography, responsive cards and a newsletter CTA for early access.

title: Colorful soundscapes, instantly.
description: A visually rich landing page that highlights albums, tour dates, and email capture.

title: Personal coaching. Measurable gains.
description: Professional landing page with clear pricing, short coach bio, and a conversion-focused enquiry form.

title: Built for speed — minimal assets, maximum impression.
description: Performance-optimized single page with lazy media, critical CSS, and tiny JS footprint.

title: Nature’s touch, modern results.
description: A plant-forward serum that soothes, hydrates, and strengthens skin using clean, transparent ingredients.

title: Moments that last a lifetime.
description: Elegant wedding and portrait photography with a focus on timeless storytelling.

title: Find your flow, build your core.
description: Minimal, movement-first landing page emphasizing classes, benefits, and a fast sign-up funnel.

title: Personalize your space with art that reflects your style.
description: A sleek, interactive product detail page that lets users customize wall art frames in real time — from frame type, color, size, to matting — with smooth transitions and a responsive design.

title: Fuel well. Move well. Feel well.
description: A practical wellness system combining mindful habits, nutrition coaching, movement programming, and recovery rituals.

title: Woven luxury, effortless presence.
description: Designer furniture that merges artisanal texture with minimalist, high-end silhouettes.

title: Capturing light in motion.
description: A minimal portfolio celebrating vibrant portraits and motion — landing soon with a purple-pink wave reveal.

title: Elegance in every pixel.
description: A fashion-forward landing page combining motion design and minimalism to deliver a luxurious, brand-focused web experience.

title: Empowering Digital Transformations.
description: A modern and responsive technology landing page built with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript.

title: Where Every Photo Finds Its Perfect Frame.
description: A clean and modern photo-frame eCommerce interface built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Showcasing a variety of customizable frames to enhance and protect your cherished memories.
